admins_insert_admin.name: admins_insert_admin
admins_insert_admin.withCheck:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM admins
          WHERE email = (auth.jwt()->>'email')::text
        )

admins_delete_admin.name: admins_delete_admin
admins_delete_admin.using:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM admins
          WHERE email = (auth.jwt()->>'email')::text
        )

learning_card_select_scoped.name: learning_card_select_scoped
learning_card_select_scoped.using:
"learning_card"."is_active" = true AND 
        "learning_card"."is_valid" = true AND (
          "learning_card"."card_scope" = 'shared' OR 
          ("learning_card"."card_scope" = 'personalized' AND ("learning_card"."card_data"->'meta'->>'userId')::uuid = (select auth.uid()))
        )

learning_card_admin_all.name: learning_card_admin_all
learning_card_admin_all.using:
EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM admins
    WHERE email = (auth.jwt()->>'email')::text
  )

learning_content_select_active.name: learning_content_select_active
learning_content_select_active.using:
"learning_content"."is_active" = true
        AND EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM "learning_product"
          WHERE "learning_product"."id" = "learning_content"."learning_product_id"
          AND "learning_product"."is_active" = true
        )
